sn1.8:4.2: Standing to one side, that deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.8:5.1: “Those who are very confused about the teachings,
sn1.8:5.2: who may be led astray in the doctrines of others;
sn1.8:5.3: asleep, they have not woken up:
sn1.8:5.4: it is time for them to wake!”
sn1.8:6.1: “Those who are unconfused about the teachings,
sn1.8:6.2: who won’t be led astray by the doctrines of others;
sn1.8:6.3: they’ve woken up, they rightly know,
sn1.8:6.4: they live smooth in the rough.”
